experiences.name: Developer Swift
experiences.description: My mission was to create a prototype using the ScreenTime API to manage screen time. I had to utilize Swift concepts such as FamilyControls and DeviceActivityMonitor to manage the device's applications and perform background actions.

experiences.name: Developer Swift
experiences.description: As a former sneaker reseller, I identified a problem : the lack of a dedicated management application. I then contacted SamaraCG, the renowned private group specializing in sneaker reselling, to propose developing a management application for their members. My mission was to create this sneaker management application named WaveSpace.

feedbacks.name: Said Guidirne
feedbacks.feedback: I've had the pleasure of working with this freelancer and I'm extremely satisfied with the quality of his work. He demonstrated his professionalism by answering all my questions promptly and always being available to discuss the details of the project.

feedbacks.name: Walhan
feedbacks.feedback: To be honest, WaveSpace is one of the best projects I've done with Theo (out of the many we've worked on together). It was an accounting management application specifically designed for trainer retailers, and I have to say I'm absolutely delighted with the result. Théo was very responsive whenever I needed changes or adjustments (with follow-up even after the application was finished). He always listens to my requests and understands my needs perfectly. In terms of value for money, WaveSpace is more than reasonable. Théo offers very competitive rates without ever sacrificing quality of service. He is also very understanding when it comes to budget issues. Overall, I would highly recommend working with Theo as it has been a positive and rewarding experience.
